skillTree.name: Ursun's Protection
skillTree.description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Imported Weaponry
skillTree.description: Kislev has many good artisans, and the best horses a human could ever breed, but when guns and ammunition are needed, any experienced leader will trade with the Empire and Dwarfs.

effects.description: Range: +5% for Armoured Kossars, Streltsi, Kreml Guard with rifles, and War Sleds units
Missile Damage: +5% for Little Grom units
Range: +10% for Armoured Kossars, Streltsi, Kreml Guard with rifles, and War Sleds units
Missile Damage: +10% for Little Grom units

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: On the March
skillTree.description: Most Kislevites are used to walk and ride days on puruit of roaming Chaos warbands and other invaders.

skillTree.name: Vodka for Everyone!
skillTree.description: A Kislevite army without vodka is like a bear without teeth and claws.

skillTree.name: The Strength Of the Faithful
skillTree.description: Our gods stand with us in the battlefield, protecting us from the Dark Powers.

effects.description: Magic Resistance: +10% for Torch Bearers of Dazh, Sons of ursun, Claws of Ursun, and Hammers of Tor units

skillTree.name: This is OUR Homeland
skillTree.description: We have endured the attacks of the servants of the Dark Powers for centuries, and we will keep doing it as long as one of us still breaths.

effects.description: Armour: +4 for Cavalry, Bear Cavalry, Sleds and Monsters units
Armour: +6 for Cavalry, Bear Cavalry, Sleds and Monsters units
Armour: +8 for Cavalry, Bear Cavalry, Sleds and Monsters units

skillTree.name: Big Booms
skillTree.description: An explosion of this size rattles rather more than just teeth!

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Monster Hunter
skillTree.description: "Beware, ye foul, fell beasties, for your very doom approacheth!"

skillTree.name: Blacker Powder
skillTree.description: "It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Hornswaggle
skillTree.description: You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Gunsight
skillTree.description: A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.

skillTree.name: All Hands Hoay!
skillTree.description: "Now listen up an' listen goodâ€¦ here be the planâ€¦"

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Dead Eyes
skillTree.description: â€¦literally, though they never miss.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Iron Discipline
skillTree.description: Kislevite men are corageous and eager for battle, but any successful captain knows that order and obedience are even more important on a ship. Or any battlefield.

skillTree.name: All Hands on Deck
skillTree.description: Being a threatened land, Kislev needs everyone who can man a gun or wield an axe against Norscan raiders or Chaos Warriors.

effects.description: Missile Damage: +3% for Kossars, and Armoured Kossars units
Melee Attack +2 for Woodsmen, City Watch infantry, Kossars, and Armoured Kossars units
Melee Defence +3 for Woodsmen, and City Watch Infantry units
Missile Damage: +6% for Kossars, and Armoured Kossars units
Melee Attack +4 for Woodsmen, City Watch infantry, Kossars, and Armoured Kossars units
Melee Defence +5 for Woodsmen, and City Watch Infantry units
Missile Damage: +8% for Kossars, and Armoured Kossars units
Melee Attack +6 for Woodsmen, City Watch infantry, Kossars, and Armoured Kossars units
Melee Defence +7 for Woodsmen, and City Watch Infantry units

skillTree.name: On Land As at Sea
skillTree.description: WhatÂ´s the Oblast but an open, endless sea of mud that turns green on summer and white in winter? In the end, sailors or soldiers need the same supplies and same combat and firing drills.

effects.description: Armour: +4 for Streltsi, Tzar Guard, Torch Bearers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun, Ice Guard and Kreml Guard units
Ammunition: +10% for Streltsi, Ice Guard, Torch Bearers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun and Kreml Guard (Rifles) units
Missile Damage: +3% for Streltsi, Ice Guard, Torch Barers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun, and Kreml Guard (Rifles) units
Weapon Strength: +5% for Streltsi, Tzar Guard, Ice Guard, Sons of Ursun, and Kreml Guard units
Armour: +7 for Streltsi, Tzar Guard, Torch Bearers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun, Ice Guard and Kreml Guard units
Ammunition: +15% for Streltsi, Ice Guard, Torch Bearers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun and Kreml Guard (Rifles) units
Missile Damage: +6% for Streltsi, Ice Guard, Torch Barers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun, and Kreml Guard (Rifles) units
Weapon Strength: +7% for Streltsi, Tzar Guard, Ice Guard, Sons of Ursun, and Kreml Guard units
Armour: +10 for Streltsi, Tzar Guard, Torch Bearers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun, Ice Guard and Kreml Guard units
Ammunition: +20% for Streltsi, Ice Guard, Torch Bearers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun and Kreml Guard (Rifles) units
Missile Damage: +8% for Streltsi, Ice Guard, Torch Barers of Dazh, Sons of Ursun, and Kreml Guard (Rifles) units
Weapon Strength: +9% for Streltsi, Tzar Guard, Ice Guard, Sons of Ursun, and Kreml Guard units

skillTree.name: Send the Explorers!
skillTree.description: Leading a fleet or an army, knowledge of the weather, the surroundings and the enemy positions is always necessary.

effects.description: Speed: +4% for Kossovite Dervishes, Snow Leopard, Horse Archers, Mounted City Watch, and Winged Lancers units
Melee Attack +2 for Kossovite Dervishes, Snow Leopard, Mounted City Watch, and Winged Lancers units
Reload Time Reduction: +4% for Horse Archers units
Speed: +8% for Kossovite Dervishes, Snow Leopard, Horse Archers, Mounted City Watch, and Winged Lancers units
Melee Attack +4 for Kossovite Dervishes, Snow Leopard, Mounted City Watch, and Winged Lancers units
Reload Time Reduction: +8% for Horse Archers units
Speed: +12% for Kossovite Dervishes, Snow Leopard, Horse Archers, Mounted City Watch, and Winged Lancers units
Melee Attack +6 for Kossovite Dervishes, Snow Leopard, Mounted City Watch, and Winged Lancers units
Reload Time Reduction: +12% for Horse Archers units

skillTree.name: Sea of Claws Marines
skillTree.description: Elite forces capable of boarding Black Arks, or land on Norsca to attack a coast town full of raiders are always welcome aboard the fleets of Kislev, even if handling the beasts can be slightly troublesome.

effects.description: Missile Resistance: +10% for Elemental Bears units
Melee Attack +2 for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, Hammers of Tor, and Elemental Bears units
Melee Defence +3 for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, Hammers of Tor, and Elemental Bears units
Weapon Strength: +4% for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, and Hammers of Tor units
Missile Resistance: +15% for Elemental Bears units
Melee Attack +4 for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, Hammers of Tor, and Elemental Bears units
Melee Defence +6 for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, Hammers of Tor, and Elemental Bears units
Weapon Strength: +8% for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, and Hammers of Tor units
Missile Resistance: +20% for Elemental Bears units
Melee Attack +6 for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, Hammers of Tor, and Elemental Bears units
Melee Defence +8 for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, Hammers of Tor, and Elemental Bears units
Weapon Strength: +10% for Wardens of the Homeland, Tzar Noble Cavalry, Gryphon Legion, War Bear Riders, Claws of Ursun, and Hammers of Tor units

skillTree.name: Adaptive Maneuvers
skillTree.description: Maybe not as big and heavy, but war sleds are very similar to ships and some naval tactics can be adapted to make a better use of them.

effects.description: Speed: +4% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units
Ammunition: +10% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units
Missile Damage: +3% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units
Speed: +8% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units
Ammunition: +15% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units
Missile Damage: +6% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units
Speed: +12% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units
Ammunition: +20% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units
Missile Damage: +8% for War Sleds, and Little Grom units

skillTree.name: Skirmisher Traditions
skillTree.description: The warriors of the north carry conflict in their blood, a legacy left by the Khan-Kings and Khan-Queens of old.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Ammunition: +15% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 10% for Kossars, Armoured Kossars, Streltsi and Ice Guard units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Horsemasters
skillTree.description: Descended of the proud horse-warriors of the Gospodar, all Kislevites are born to the saddle like their ancestors before them.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +12 for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Kossovite Dervishes, Horse Archers, Winged Lancers, and Gryphon Legion units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Ursun's Favoured
skillTree.description: "Ursun is with us, brothers! None can stand against the beasts of the Bear-God!"

effects.description: Armour: +10 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bear, Snow Leopard and Tzar Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bears, Snow Leopard and Tzar Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
Spell resistance: 15% for War Bear Riders, Elemental Bears, Snow Leopard and Tzar Guard units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Battle Engineers
skillTree.description: The workshops of the north are always busy, their engineers working tirelessly in the pursuit of battle excellence.

effects.description: Ammunition: +20% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)
Reload time reduction: +10% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for War Sleds and Little Grom units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Leader of Renown
skillTree.description: Revered by the Warrior Priests, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Kossar Headman
backgroundSkills.description: Some men are natural leaders, born to foster and marshal their tribes through devastating wars and the harshest of winters.

backgroundSkills.name: Strongholder
backgroundSkills.description: For those used to life in the oblasts, keeping the elements out is only the beginning of the measures they must take to ensure the survival of their people.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 when in own territory

backgroundSkills.name: Vanguard
backgroundSkills.description: This valorous warrior has been at the forefront of the struggle against Ruin before, and they certainly shall be again, steeled and girded by that dreadful experience.

effects.description: Leadership: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

backgroundSkills.name: Judicator
backgroundSkills.description: By right of his storied experience, this one is trusted to make sound judgements in the best interests of the Motherland.

backgroundSkills.name: Student of Miska
backgroundSkills.description: The ancient Khan-Queen Miska practised Ice Magic to the very highest grade; this one studies her methods in the hope of attaining similar greatness herself.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +8% when increasing
